snippet: M&T, a regional lender based in Buffalo, has redeemed $700 million of the government's preferred shares, but it still owes taxpayers $382 million.
abstract: M&T, a regional lender based in Buffalo, has redeemed $700 million of the government's preferred shares, but it still owes taxpayers $382 million.

headline.main: Despite Good Health, Bank Holds Tight to TARP Funds
headline.print_headline: Despite Good Health, Bank Holds Tight to TARP Loans
